text: Boom Crash Opera are an Australian rock band formed in 1985. The band have released six studio albums, six compilation albums, one EP, one box set and nineteen singles. ==Studio albums== {| class="wikitable" ! rowspan="2" width="33"|Year ! rowspan="2" width="240"|Title ! colspan="1"|Peak chart positions ! rowspan="2"|Certifications (sales thresholds) |- !style="width:3em;font-size:75%"|AUS Australian chart peaks: *Top 100 (Kent Music Report) peaks to 19 June 1988: N.B.
